imdb.plot outline: Mr. Baby is 15 months old and he speaks with the sharp wit of a 50 year old misanthrope. And although he tyrannizes his family when he's in that kind of mood, his sparkling eloquence makes him totally endearing because sitting way up there in his high-chair, he's the only one in the family with enough critical distance to unravel and solve the family's daily problems.
imdb.title: Mr Baby
plot: Mr. Baby is 15 months old and he speaks with the sharp wit of a 50 year old misanthrope. And although he tyrannizes his family when he's in that kind of mood, his sparkling eloquence makes him totally endearing because sitting way up there in his high-chair, he's the only one in the family with enough critical distance to unravel and solve the family's daily problems.
